en.banner: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.
en.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunal service
en.body:
Use this service to upload and submit a completed form.

Before you start

You cannot save your progress so it is important you have everything you need before you start.

You might need to upload supporting documents with your completed application.

Some applications may ask for a fee, so make sure you have your payment details ready.

You will be asked a few simple questions. You can review the answers to these questions before you submit them with your application.

cy.banner: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it. (whelsh)
cy.heading: Submit an application to HM Courts and Tribunal service (whelsh)
cy.body:
Use this service to upload and submit a completed form.

Before you start
You may be asked to upload supporting documents along with a completed application.
Some application may require a fee payment, so make sure you have everything you need to hand before getting started.

Submitting an application
As well as uploading a completed application form, you will also be asked a handful of simple questions. You’ll be able to review and change the answers you give to these questions before you submit them - welsh.
